snippet: Football is called a game of action, not words. But in the modern game, between the plays at least, it seems as if no one shuts up.
abstract: Folklore maintains that football is a game of action, not words, but in the modern game, at least between plays, a babble of technological strategizing takes place among team members; New York Giants are learning a new offensive system, and how well the players are communicating with each other has become a hot topic.
lead_paragraph: Football is called a game of action, not words. But in the modern game, between the plays at least, it seems as if no one shuts up.

headline.main: On the Field, the Babble Is Usually Towering
headline.print_headline: On the Field, the Babble Is Usually Towering
